description: A set of questions to test the software with
name: Pilot IP 17 Oct

questions.question: 212. (Instructor) What are the requirements for a touch and go (IP in the seat)?
responses: Runway length: 9000', Minimum ceiling and visibility: 600' and 1, wet runway- RCR>12, crosswind: 25 kts or less
Runway length: 9000', Minimum ceiling and visibility: 200' and 3/4, wet runway- RCR>3, crosswind: 25 kts or less
Runway length: 7000', Minimum ceiling and visibility: 300' and 3/4, wet runway- RCR=12, crosswind: 25 kts or less
Runway length: 7000', Minimum ceiling and visibility: 300' and 3/4, wet runway- RCR>12, crosswind: 30 kts or less

questions.question: 213. (Instructor) Training Flight Restrictions: What is the maximum brake temperature for Assault Landing Zone Operations (N/A to GOAT)?
214. (Instructor) What is the altitude at which you must initiate a visual low approach and/or planned go around?
215. (Instructor) For loss of currency up to 6 months, an aircrew member must demonstrate proficiency ____ in all delinquent items
responses: With an instructor (or ATS instructor for SIM creditable events)

questions.question: 216. (Instructor) What are the procedures if the spoilers fail to automatically retract during a touch and go?
responses: The PF rotates with MCT selected and the PM will manually set the Spoilers switch to Off (dearm)
The PF advances the throttles to MAX and the PM will manually set the Spoilers switch to Off (dearm)
